original_text: Since, then, you have been raised with Christ, set your hearts on things above, where Christ is, seated at the right hand of God.
korean_text: 그러므로 너희가 그리스도와 함께 다시 살리심을 받았으면 위의 것을 찾으라 거기는 그리스도께서 하나님 우편에 앉아 계시느니라

sentences.original_text: Since, then, you have been raised with Christ
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 너희가 그리스도와 함께 일으키심을 받았으니

sentences.original_text: set your hearts on things above
seated at the right hand of God
